Uses of Class
io.permazen.core.DeleteAction

  • Packages that use DeleteAction 
    Package Description
    io.permazen
    Abstraction layer allowing access to a Database using normal Java objects.
    io.permazen.annotation
    Annotations used for automatic creation of a Permazen and corresponding schema configuration of the underlying Database from annotated classes, as well as automatic registration of various listeners, etc.
    io.permazen.core
    Core classes for the Permazen Java persistence layer.
    io.permazen.schema
    Classes for modeling Permazen Database schemas.

    • Uses of DeleteAction in io.permazen

      Methods in io.permazen that return DeleteAction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DeleteAction JReferenceField.getOnDelete()
      Get the DeleteAction configured for this field.

    • Uses of DeleteAction in io.permazen.annotation

      Methods in io.permazen.annotation that return DeleteAction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DeleteAction onDelete()
      For reference fields, configure the behavior when the referred-to object is deleted.

    • Uses of DeleteAction in io.permazen.core

      Methods in io.permazen.core that return DeleteAction 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      DeleteAction ReferenceField.getOnDelete()
      Get the desired behavior when an object referred to by this field is deleted.
      static DeleteAction DeleteAction.valueOf​(String name)
      Returns the enum constant of this type with the specified name.
      static DeleteAction[] DeleteAction.values()
      Returns an array containing the constants of this enum type, in the order they are declared.
